channel.title: Server-Messed Up
channel.description:
Okay, I'm not sure how this happened... at all.
Anybody know?
Whenever I start my runserver.bat, it starts, and then this error pops up: [code]:::::::::::::::: ::::Starting:::: :::::::::::::::: ::::::::::::::::::::::::: ::::::::ZaroScape:::::::: :::::::::Started::::::::: ::::::::::::::::::::::::: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "5 730 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:121) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:30) [/code]
Anybody know what is wrong, and how to fix?
Thanks, Zach

item.title: Server-Messed Up
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

Okay, I’m not sure how this happened… at all.

Anybody know?

Whenever I start my runserver.bat, it starts, and then this error pops up:

::::Starting::::
::::::::::::::::
:::::::::::::::::::::::::
::::::::ZaroScape::::::::
:::::::::Started:::::::::
:::::::::::::::::::::::::
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "5
730 "
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:121)
at ShopHandler.(ShopHandler.java:30)
at server.main(server.java:30)
[/code]

Anybody know what is wrong, and how to fix?

Thanks,
Zach
